item.text: The Lord revealed the following message during the year in which King Sargon of Assyria sent his commanding general to Ashdod, and he fought against it and captured it.

At that time the Lord announced through Isaiah son of Amoz: “Go, remove the sackcloth from your waist and take your sandals off your feet.” He did as instructed and walked around in undergarments and barefoot.
Later the Lord explained, “In the same way that my servant Isaiah has walked around in undergarments and barefoot for the past three years, as an object lesson and omen pertaining to Egypt and Cush,

<st data-num="03651" class="">so</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st> of <st data-num="0804" class="">Assyria</st> will <st data-num="05090" class="">lead away</st> the <st data-num="07628" class="">captives</st> of <st data-num="04714" class="">Egypt</st> and the <st data-num="01546" class="">exiles</st> of <st data-num="03568" class="">Cush</st>, both <st data-num="05288" class="">young</st> and <st data-num="02205" class="">old</st>. They will be <st data-num="06174" class="">in undergarments</st> and <st data-num="03182" class="">barefoot</st>, with the <st data-num="08357" class="">buttocks</st> <st data-num="02834" class="">exposed</st>; the <st data-num="04714" class="">Egyptians</st> will be <st data-num="06172" class="">publicly humiliated</st>.<n id="1" />

Those who put their <st data-num="04007" class="">hope</st> in <st data-num="03568" class="">Cush</st> and took <st data-num="08597" class="">pride</st> in <st data-num="04714" class="">Egypt</st> will <st data-num="02865 0954">be</st> <st data-num="02865" class="">afraid</st> and <st data-num="0954" class="">embarrassed</st>.<n id="1" />
At that time those who live on this coast will say, ‘Look what has happened to our source of hope to whom we fled for help, expecting to be rescued from the king of Assyria! How can we escape now?’”
